content:
# The attempt to place the Stone Furnace failed again due to the player position still being at (0.0, 0.0). 
# This indicates that the movement commands are not functioning correctly, and I am unable to update my position in the environment.

# To troubleshoot this issue, I will try to execute a command to explicitly check my current player position again.
# This will help confirm whether the movement commands are being executed properly.

# Step 41: Fetch my player position explicitly to see the current coordinates.
player_entities = get_entities({Prototype.Player})  # Attempt to retrieve my player position from the existing entities
if player_entities:
    player_position = player_entities[0].position  # Extract my player position from the entity list
    print(f"My current position is {player_position}.")  # Output the current player position.
else:
    print("No player entities found, unable to confirm player position.")  # Handle the case where no player entities are found.
